cern.dip

Interface DipPublicationErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShortLivedPublisher

    public interface DipPublicationErrorHandler
    This interface enables asynchronous DIP errors to be reported. Dip errors that can not be associated with any DIP method call are reported through this interface.

    This interface must be implemented by the DIP developer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleException(DipPublication publication, DipException ex)
      invoked when an asynch error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

        invoked when an asynch error occurs.
        Parameters:
        Publication - source of the error
        error - description.
